com.karuslabs.commons.menu

Class SharedMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.karuslabs.commons.menu.SharedMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Menu

    public class SharedMenu
extends Object
implements Menu
    Represents a static menu that can be shared among multiple players.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SharedMenu(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory)
      Constructs this with the specified inventory.
      SharedMenu(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory, Button defaultButton)
      Constructs this with the specified inventory and default button.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SharedMenu bind(int slot, Button button)
      Binds a button instance to the specified slot.
      Map<Integer,Button> getButtons()
      Returns the menu's slots and buttons binded to them.
      Button getDefaultButton()
      Returns the default behavior for when no button has been binded to a slot.
      org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory getInventory()
      Returns the backing Inventory instance.
      void onClick(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent event)
      Delegates event handling to a Button instance binded to the slot.
      void setDefaultButton(Button defaultButton)
      Sets the default behavior for slots for which no buttons have been binded.
